welcome.title: Welcome to DataShift
welcome.description: This page contains short instructions for the main sections and actions. Each section has a place for an interface screenshot.

start.title: Quick start
start.step1: Create a data source in the ‘Sources’ section.
start.step2: Configure a migration: choose a source and parameters.
start.step3: Run the migration and track the progress.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: In ‘Sources’ you add connections: databases, APIs, files. Specify parameters, test the connection, and save.

migrations.title: Migrations
migrations.description: Migrations describe what and how is transferred from a source. Configure steps, filters, and schedule (cron) if needed. Start and monitor statuses.

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: Datasets help prepare curated selections for display and analysis. Configure SQL/rules and test the result.

errors.title: Errors and notifications
errors.description: ‘Errors’ shows problem messages, their status and details. You can mark errors as read and filter by type.

settings.title: Settings and users
settings.description: Here you configure users, roles, and interface parameters. Only users with the ‘admin’ role can edit users.
